org.locationtech.geowave.format.sentinel2.theia

Class TheiaImageryProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.format.sentinel2.Sentinel2ImageryProvider
      • org.locationtech.geowave.format.sentinel2.theia.TheiaImageryProvider

  • public class TheiaImageryProvider
extends Sentinel2ImageryProvider
    Sentinel2 imagery provider for the Theia repository. See: https://theia.cnes.fr
